# reflection

**Instance Property**

Obtains a reflection object for this render pipeline.

## Declaration

```swift
var reflection: MTLRenderPipelineReflection? { get }
```

## Discussion

When you create the pipeline through an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice] instance, reflection is `nil`.
title: reflection
